: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw remained uncouncious as he was swung over KitKat's shoulder. He only made a few barely audiable sounds of pain, as he was in emergency stasis lock. His internal repairs started to kick in.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She came up to a body of a bot that wasn't moving. It was SharpClaw. 
She was already in pain, but didn't care. He seemed to be in more 
trouble than he right then.  She picked him up, threw his body over 
her shoulder and walked towards the base. With luck, another bot 
would help her. In the mean time, she grinded her teeth together and 
walked him away from the battle and towards the base.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> Now released from Battera, SharpClaw was freefalling. He knew this 
would damage him badly, but it had been worth it to have such a nice 
shot on that Maximal femme.
> SharpClaw changes to beast mode, before slamming into the ground. 
He layed motionless.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:Battera::
> 
> She felt the blast go from her belly up and out her shoulder. The 
> pain was blinding. She lost her sence of where or what was 
happening. 
> She followed her program and tried to fly higher. They had already 
> managed to reach 700 feet in a short time. Her huge wings flapped 
> hard as she flew almost straight up with her burden of the other 
> bot.  She climbed to almost 1000 feet when she could no longer 
> struggle with her load or against the pain and let him fall.
> 
> Her body seemed slightly releived to no longer half to fly with 
that 
> much weight. But the blast had done damage. Her wings started to 
> tighten up and she too, started to fall. 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : SharpClaw : :
> > SharpClaw allowed himself to be captured in Battera's claw. While 
> in her grasp, he presses the barrel of his rifle right against her 
> bat mode body.
> > SharpClaw: You know the closer your enemy is too you the bigger 
> advantage they have.
> > SharpClaw opens fire, releasing a plasma blast that will strike 
> Battera instently, as it leaves the barrel.
> 
> 
>
